item.title: UCG video - Greek speaker GIRL - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a dynamic and creative female fluent in Greek to collaborate with our company in creating User-Generated Content (UGC) videos to promote our product. If you are passionate about video content creation, possess excellent Greek language skills, and want to be part of a creative endeavor, this opportunity is for you!

- Create Greek-language UGC videos to promote our product.
- Fluent in Greek.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 28, 2024 05:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Production, Greek, Female, Video Editing, Voice Acting, Translation, Voice-Over
Skills: Video Production, Greek, Female, Video Editing, Voice Acting, Translation, Voice-Over

item.title: Podcast Episode Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled individual to edit our podcast episodes. As an editor, your main responsibility will be to enhance the overall quality and flow of our episodes. The ideal candidate should have experience in audio and video editing software and be familiar with podcast production techniques. Attention to detail is crucial, as you will be responsible for removing any technical glitches, background noise, and ensuring a seamless listening experience. This is a great opportunity for someone who is passionate about podcasts and wants to contribute to the success of our show.

Skills required:
- Proficiency in audio editing software (e.g., Adobe Audition, Audacity)
-video editing (final cut pro, adobe premier)
- Strong attention to detail
- Familiarity with podcast production techniques
- Excellent communication skills (english first language)

Hourly Range: $15.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 04:31 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Post Production, Audacity, Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Production
Skills: Audio Post Production, Audacity, Audio Editing, Podcast, Audio Production
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Instagram Reel Production - Upwork
item.description:
Small Business looking for someone to compile a 15-20 second Instagram Reel using jpg images (to be provided). Here is an example of the desired format: https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8bAjxIsCsz/

Previous experience on boosting/maximizing Algorhithms appreciated!

Would prefer a set price per Reel, please.

Thank you for your consideration!

Hourly Range: $7.00-$14.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 04:25 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Photo Slideshow
Skills: Photo Slideshow
Country: United States
